name: hautnah_dc
description: Mido. Manage your tasks like a pro

scripts.prod: pm2 start shard.js --name Mido --max-memory-restart 500M && pm2 monit
scripts.restart: pm2 stop Mido && pm2 start shard.js --name Mido --max-memory-restart 500M && pm2 monit
scripts.kill: pm2 stop Mido && pm2 delete Mido

author: BlackDayz
